features: 👩‍🍳 MULTI-PURPOSE SERBIAN CHEF KNIFE - The classic 6-inch Kitchen Knife is suitable for daily kitchen tasks such as cutting, mincing, chunking, meat slicing, slicing, vegetables, fruits, bread, and flattened garlic. This Serbian chef's knife is also suitable for barbecuing, hunting, hiking and camping. It is definitely a practical assistant for you both indoors and outdoors.

👩‍🍳 PREMIUM HIGH CARBON STEEL - This pro chef knife is made of high quality high carbon steel, which is harder and more durable blade. The upgraded Serbian chef knife adopts exclusive rust prevention technology, which solves the annoyance of rust on the blade.The edges are hand-polished to 16° on each side and the V-shaped blade minimizes resistance when cutting.

👩‍🍳 FORGED CRAFTSMANSHIP - LONGQUAN knife is hand forged by artisans with decades of experience. Compared with ordinary kitchen knives, our chef knives can provide a longer service life. The blade is hand-forged by professional craftsmen, leaving a unique hammered texture that is both aesthetically pleasing and prevents food from sticking to the blade, making it easy to clean and maintain.

👩‍🍳 ERGONOMIC HANDLE - The ergonomical dragon scale design handle ensures comfort and operability; Reinforced bolster effectively prevents handle breakage. It also allows for effortless cutting, provides precise cutting control and realizes a relaxed and efficient kitchen cutting experience. Our Serbian Chef's Knife has excellent non-slip and excellent balance to minimize numbness or pain in the palm and wrist, no fatigue even after long time use.

👩‍🍳 LIFETIME WARRANTY - Our after-sales team provides you with permanent after-sales support services, providing 100% satisfaction guarantee. If there are quality issues, we provide lifelong free replacement service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, and we have a professional after-sales team to answer them for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This is a high quality handmade kitchen knife, made of high-quality carbon steel, which is more wear-resistant, sharper, and more durable. The handle with excellent texture is non-slip, and waterproof, providing a comfortable grip and reducing hand fatigue. The ergonomic handle design is more labor-saving. This kitchen knife is suitable for kitchen cooking, camping, hiking, and outdoor barbecue. It is a good gift for chefs, parents, friends and other people on Christmas, birthdays, and other holidays.

Dragon Head Carving • The position of the knife pillow is carved with dragon head, which is made of copper-plated material to improve product quality, increase its wear resistance and deformation resistance, and use it for long time without being eroded by acid, alkali and so on. Due to its copper yellow luster on the surface, it enhances the overall aesthetic of this knife. When you receive this knife, you can't help but admire its design. Dragon Scale Handle • The surface of the handle is attached with dragon scales, which not only enhances the appearance of the knife, but also increases the friction between your palm and the handle when in contact, preventing injuries from inadvertent slipping when using. It has a good anti-slip effect, especially when your hands are wet or in humid weather. Protect your safety in every use. Forging Workmanship • Through multiple compound forging, the blade takes on a black, irregular, thick-striped forged pattern instead of a laser pattern. Due to the inky black hammer pattern left by forging, this chef knife presents a premium texture. • Black hammer marks are also anti-stick hammer marks: as the blade is hammered hundreds of times, the surface of the blade is uneven to prevent food from sticking to the knife. Hanging Hole • Hanging hole at the tip of the knife make it easy for you to hang it up without taking up space in your kitchen. The hanging hole has undergone professional polishing treatment, and even if hung for a long time, it will not wear out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bueno y de calidad.
reviews.reviewText: Buen cuchillo, calidad y Muy buen tiempo de entrega, vendedor recomendado.

Love this blade, super sharp and great design, light weight but still weighty enough to chop. you can chop, slice, dice etc. i find myself using this more than my standard kitchen knives, only using the paring and filleting knifes now
